resolvers.requestMappingTemplate:
## By default in a before template, all you need is a valid JSON payload.
## You can also stash data to be made available to the functions in the pipeline.
## Examples: 
## - $ctx.stash.put("email", $ctx.args.email)
## - $ctx.stash.put("badgeNumber", $ctx.args.input.badgeNumber)
## - $ctx.stash.put("username", $ctx.identity.username)
## Game
#set( $cols = [] )
#set( $vals = [] )

## Question
#set( $questionsCols = [] )
#set( $questionsVals = [] )
#set( $questionCurIdx = 0 )
#set ( $questionsValStr = "" )
#set ( $nowVarName = ":NOW")

## Game
#foreach( $entry in $ctx.args.game.keySet() )
	#if ($ctx.args.game[$entry])
    	#if( $entry == 'imageUrl' )
        	#set( $discard = $cols.add("image_url") )
        #elseif( $entry == 'phaseOneTime' )
        	#set( $discard = $cols.add("phase_one_time") )
        #elseif( $entry == 'phaseTwoTime' )
        	#set( $discard = $cols.add("phase_two_time") )
        #else
        	#set( $discard = $cols.add($entry) )
        #end
        #set( $discard = $vals.add("'$ctx.args.game[$entry]'") )
    #end
#end
#set( $discard = $cols.add("updated_at") )
#set( $discard = $vals.add($nowVarName) )
#set( $discard = $cols.add("created_at") )
#set( $discard = $vals.add($nowVarName) )
#set( $valStr = $vals.toString().replace("[","(").replace("]",")") )
#set( $colStr = $cols.toString().replace("[","(").replace("]",")") )
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("valStr", $valStr))
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("colStr", $colStr))
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("now", $util.toJson($util.time.nowISO8601())))
{} ## Intentional
resolvers.responseMappingTemplate:
## The after mapping template is used to collect the final value that is returned by the resolver. 
$util.toJson($ctx.result)

resolvers.requestMappingTemplate:
## By default in a before template, all you need is a valid JSON payload.
## You can also stash data to be made available to the functions in the pipeline.
## Examples: 
## - $ctx.stash.put("email", $ctx.args.email)
## - $ctx.stash.put("badgeNumber", $ctx.args.input.badgeNumber)
## - $ctx.stash.put("username", $ctx.identity.username)
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("gameId", $ctx.args.gameQuestion["gameId"]))
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("id", $ctx.args.gameQuestion["questionId"]))
#set( $gameQuestionVal = [$ctx.stash.gameId, $ctx.stash.id] )
#set( $gameQuestionValStr = $gameQuestionVal.toString().replace("[","(").replace("]",")") )
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("now", $util.toJson($util.time.nowISO8601())))
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("gameQuestionValStr", $gameQuestionValStr))
{}

resolvers.requestMappingTemplate:
#set( $updateList = {} )
#foreach( $entry in $ctx.args.game.keySet() )
  #if ( $ctx.args.game[$entry] )
  	#if( $entry == 'imageUrl' )
        #set( $discard = $updateList.put("image_url", "'$ctx.args.game[$entry]'") )
    #elseif( $entry == 'phaseOneTime' )
        #set( $discard = $updateList.put("phase_one_time", "'$ctx.args.game[$entry]'") )
    #elseif( $entry == 'phaseTwoTime' )
        #set( $discard = $updateList.put("phase_two_time", "'$ctx.args.game[$entry]'") )
  	#else
    	#set( $discard = $updateList.put($entry, "'$ctx.args.game[$entry]'") )
    #end
  #end
#end
#set( $update = $updateList.toString().replace("{","").replace("}","") )
{
  "version": "2018-05-29",
  "statements": [
  	"UPDATE games SET $update, updated_at = :NOW WHERE id = :ID", 
    "SELECT g.*, to_char(g.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD\"T\"HH24:MI:SS\"Z\"') AS created_date_time, to_char(g.updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD\"T\"HH24:MI:SS\"Z\"') AS updated_date_time, q.id AS question_id, q.text AS question_text, q.answer AS question_answer, q.image_url AS question_image_url, q.instructions AS question_instructions, to_char(q.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD\"T\"HH24:MI:SS\"Z\"') AS question_created_date_time, to_char(q.updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD\"T\"HH24:MI:SS\"Z\"') AS question_updated_date_time, q.cluster AS question_cluster, q.standard AS question_standard, q.domain AS question_domain, q.wrong_answers AS question_wrong_answers, q.grade AS question_grade FROM games AS g INNER JOIN games_questions AS gq ON gq.game_id = g.id INNER JOIN questions AS q ON q.id = gq.question_id WHERE g.id = :ID"
  ],
  "variableMap": {
  	":ID": $util.toJson($ctx.args.game.id),
    ":NOW": $util.toJson($util.time.nowISO8601())
  }
}

#set ( $game = $output[0] )

#set ( $result = {
	"id": $game["id"],

    "grade": $game["grade"],
    "domain": $game["domain"],
    "cluster": $game["cluster"],
    "description": $game["description"],

    "phaseTwoTime": $game["phase_two_time"],
    "imageUrl": $game["image_url"],
    "updatedAt": $game["updated_date_time"],
    "createdAt": $game["created_date_time"],
    "questions": []
})
#foreach( $gameQuestion in $output )
	#set( $question = {
      "id": $gameQuestion["question_id"],
      "instructions": $gameQuestion["question_instructions"],
      "text": $gameQuestion["question_text"],
      "answer": $gameQuestion["question_answer"],
      "imageUrl": $gameQuestion["question_image_url"],
      "updatedAt": $gameQuestion["question_updated_date_time"],
      "createdAt": $gameQuestion["question_created_date_time"],
      "standard": $gameQuestion["question_standard"],
      "wrongAnswers": $gameQuestion["question_wrong_answers"],
      "domain": $gameQuestion["question_domain"],
      "grade": $gameQuestion["question_grade"],
      "cluster": $gameQuestion["question_cluster"]
    } )
    $util.qr($result.questions.add($question))
#end
$utils.toJson($result)

resolvers.requestMappingTemplate:
## Below example shows how to create an object from all provided GraphQL arguments
## The primary key of the obejct is a randomly generated UUD using the $util.autoId() utility
## Other utilities include $util.matches() for regular expressions, $util.time.nowISO8601() or
##   $util.time.nowEpochMilliSeconds() for timestamps, and even List or Map helpers like
##   $util.list.copyAndRetainAll() $util.map.copyAndRemoveAllKeys() for shallow copies
## Read more: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/appsync/latest/devguide/resolver-context-reference.html#utility-helpers-in-util

{
    "version" : "2017-02-28",
    "operation" : "PutItem",
    "key" : {
        "gameID": $util.dynamodb.toDynamoDBJson($ctx.args.gameID),
    },
    "attributeValues": $util.dynamodb.toMapValuesJson($ctx.args.screenData)
}

#set( $updateList = {} )
#set( $instructions = "")
#foreach( $entry in $ctx.args.question.keySet() )
  #if( $entry == "instructions" )
  	#set( $instructions = "$entry = '$utils.escapeJavaScript($utils.toJson($ctx.args.question[$entry]))', " )
  #elseif ( $entry == "wrongAnswers" and $ctx.args.question[$entry] )
  	#set( $discard = $updateList.put("wrong_answers", "'$ctx.args.question[$entry]'") )
  #elseif ( $ctx.args.question[$entry] )
  	#set( $discard = $updateList.put($entry, "'$ctx.args.question[$entry]'") )
  #end
#end
#set( $update = $updateList.toString().replace("{","").replace("}","").replace("imageUrl", "image_url") )
{
  "version": "2018-05-29",
  "statements":   [
  	"UPDATE questions SET $update, $instructions updated_at = :NOW WHERE id = :ID", 
    "SELECT *, to_char(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD\"T\"HH24:MI:SS\"Z\"') AS created_date_time, to_char(updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD\"T\"HH24:MI:SS\"Z\"') AS updated_date_time FROM questions WHERE id = :ID"
  ],
  "variableMap": {
  	":ID": $util.toJson($ctx.args.question.id),
    ":NOW": $util.toJson($util.time.nowISO8601())
  }
}
resolvers.responseMappingTemplate:
#set( $output = $utils.rds.toJsonObject($ctx.result) )
#if( $output.length() < 2 )
  $util.error("Invalid response from RDS DataSource. See info for the full response.", "InvalidResponse", {}, $output)
#end
#set( $output = $output[1] )
#if( $output.isEmpty() )
  #return
#end
#set( $output = $output[0])

#set( $result = {
	"id": $output["id"],
    "instructions": $output["instructions"],
    "text": $output["text"],
    "answer": $output["answer"],
    "imageUrl": $output["image_url"],
    "updatedAt": $output["updated_date_time"],
    "createdAt": $output["created_date_time"],
    "standard": $output["standard"],
    "grade": $output["grade"],
    "cluster": $output["cluster"],
    "wrongAnswers": $output["wrong_answers"],
    "domain": $output["domain"]
})

$util.toJson($result)
